nodes.documentation: @title Wallet for core vesting escrow functionality
nodes.name: VestingEscrowWallet

nodes.documentation: @notice This function returns the signature of the configure function

nodes.documentation:

devdoc.title: Wallet for core vesting escrow functionality

addSchedule(address,bytes32,uint256,uint.notice: Adds vesting schedules for each of the beneficiary's address

addScheduleFromTemplate(address,bytes32,.notice: Adds vesting schedules from template for the beneficiary

addScheduleFromTemplateMulti(address[],b.notice: Used to bulk add vesting schedules from template for each of the beneficiary

addScheduleMulti(address[],bytes32[],uin.notice: Used to bulk add vesting schedules for each of beneficiary

addTemplate(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Adds template that can be used for creating schedule

changeTreasuryWallet(address).notice: Used to change the treasury wallet address

configure(address).notice: Used to initialize the treasury wallet address

depositTokens(uint256).notice: Used to deposit tokens from treasury wallet to the vesting escrow wallet

getAllTemplateNames().notice: Gets the list of the template names those can be used for creating schedule

getDataStore().notice: used to return the data store address of securityToken

getInitFunction().notice: This function returns the signature of the configure function

getPermissions().notice: Return the permissions flag that are associated with VestingEscrowWallet

getSchedule(address,bytes32).notice: Returns beneficiary's schedule created using template name

getScheduleCount(address).notice: Returns count of the schedules were created for given beneficiary

getTemplateCount().notice: Returns count of the templates those can be used for creating schedule

getTemplateNames(address).notice: Returns list of the template names for given beneficiary's address

modifySchedule(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Modifies vesting schedules for each of the beneficiary

modifyScheduleMulti(address[],bytes32[],.notice: Used to bulk modify vesting schedules for each of the beneficiaries

pullAvailableTokens().notice: Used to withdraw available tokens by beneficiary

pushAvailableTokens(address).notice: Pushes available tokens to the beneficiary's address

pushAvailableTokensMulti(uint256,uint256.notice: Used to bulk send available tokens for each of the beneficiaries

removeTemplate(bytes32).notice: Removes template with a given name

revokeAllSchedules(address).notice: Revokes all vesting schedules for given beneficiary's address

revokeSchedule(address,bytes32).notice: Revokes vesting schedule with given template name for given beneficiary

revokeSchedulesMulti(address[]).notice: Used to bulk revoke vesting schedules for each of the beneficiaries

sendToTreasury(uint256).notice: Sends unassigned tokens to the treasury wallet
